docs.snippet: Paris St Germain's then sports director Leonardo declared the club were ready for tougher competitions in Europe two years ago but Tuesday's Champions League quarter-final exit suggests PSG need more time to reach the top....

docs.abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column tells story of how, thanks to honest taxi driver, diligent police detective and city's 311 help line, Manhattan man was able to recover laptop he left in trunk of cab.

headline.main: New York Is Sometimes a Faithful Place

docs.snippet: Ballmer, the former chief executive of Microsoft and the first-year owner of the Los Angeles Clippers, is, in the words of the team’s coach, “the most normal $24 billion guy I know.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ballmer, the former chief executive of Microsoft and the first-year owner of the Los Angeles Clippers, is, in the words of the team’s coach, “the most normal $24 billion guy I know.”
docs.abstract: Profile of Steven A Ballmer, former Microsoft chief executive who is now the first-year owner of Los Angeles Clippers; Ballmer, worth some $24 billion, is known both for his loud assertiveness and his regular-guy appearance; his ownership has been welcomed by many as clean break from team's past under disgraced former owner Donald Sterling.

headline.main: Steven A. Ballmer Speaks Loudly and Carries a Big Wallet
headline.print_headline: Speaking Loudly, Carrying a Big Wallet
